job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: AIML Data ScientistltbrgtSalary 150KltbrgtInterview Mode Video Interviewsltbrgtsusansoftwaregroupinccom ltbrgtltbrgtRequired Skills SetltbrgtltbrgtYears of Experience3 years of experience in developing and implementing AIClient related projectsltbrgtltbrgtEducation Required PhDltbrgtltbrgtStrong technical skills on machine learningAI with proven track record These technical skills include but not limited to regression techniques neural networks decision trees clustering pattern recognition probability theory stochastic systems Bayesian inference statistical techniques deep learning supervised learning unsupervised learning Reinforcement LearningltbrgtltbrgtStrong technical knowledge on big data technologies AWS AIClient platforms such as SageMakerltbrgtOutstanding track record of successful solutions design in the digital spaceltbrgtExperienced in using AIClient platforms technologies techniques eg TensorFlow Apache MXnet Theano Keras CNTK scikitlearn H2O Spark MLlib etcltbrgtProficiency with SQL and NoSQL databasesltbrgtProficiency with scalable data extraction tools eg Cassandra MongoDBltbrgtltbrgt
